input_text:
Job Title: Head of Operations

Location: Los Angeles Metropolitan Area

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
Our mission is to reignite personal, real-world interactions. We're reshaping networking with our innovative products that encourage conversations and forge durable connections. Leveraging NFC technology, we make networking effortless and engaging.As the Head of Operations at dot.cards, your role demands both strategic oversight and a hands-on approach as we continue to grow. You'll architect and refine our operations across finance, sales, and logistics for peak efficiency. Your work, closely aligned with our Founder and CEO, will be crucial in directing the company's strategic path while emphasizing operational excellence. Your focus will be deeply operational, actively shaping processes and mentoring our team for scalable growth. This position is about directly tackling diverse challenges and laying the groundwork for dot.cards' future success.Key Responsibilities:Champion diverse operational tasks in a rapidly evolving environment.Build and refine direct reporting frameworks to enhance communication and efficiency.Lead in financial planning and projections, steering the company towards its fiscal goals.Manage overseas logistics and product sourcing for seamless global operations.Drive initiatives to maximize efficiency and minimize costs.Leverage technology solutions and automations to improve our operational processes.Excel in people management, fostering a dynamic team culture aligned with our growth and values.Day-to-Day:Refine and enhance reporting frameworks to track and measure departmental outcomes effectively.Collaborate with cross-functional teams to enhance software and hardware product delivery.Engage in hands-on management of global operations.Foster partnerships and a customer success ethos for high-value relationships.Make informed, data-driven decisions, crucial for future planning, financial projections, and organizational scalability.Apply tech expertise to enhance operational efficiency and productivity.Qualifications:Proven experience in a rapidly growing startup environment, demonstrating adaptability and success in scaling operations.Experience in partnership and customer success program development.Strong strategic planning skills and inter-departmental collaboration expertise.Financial acumen with expertise in planning, budgeting, and forecasting.Success in hiring and scaling high-performing teams.Passion for inclusive, engaging workplace culture.Excellent analytical, problem-solving, and decision-making abilities, with a track record of operational optimization.Excellent communication, interpersonal, and leadership skills.Benefits:A competitive salary with bonus potential.Comprehensive health benefits including medical and dental coverage.The unique opportunity to help define and develop operational strategies at a thriving startup.LocationThe role is based in our Inglewood, CA office and requires in-person attendance.About dot.dot.cards is dedicated to crafting beautifully functional solutions for everyday networking challenges. We're not just building a brand; we're creating a standard for modern networking. Trusted by over 800,000 individuals and small businesses, we're a financially robust company with a successful seed funding round and operating profitably. We’re on a mission to redefine networking, and we’re looking for a Head of Operations who’s ready to join us on this journey.

Experience Level (if available): None

Drive initiatives to maximize efficiency and minimize costs
Leverage technology solutions and automations to improve operational processes
Refine and enhance reporting frameworks to track and measure departmental outcomes effectively
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to enhance software and hardware product delivery
Foster partnerships and a customer success ethos
Apply tech expertise to enhance operational efficiency and productivity
